tasks.label: Run covesa-cv-forwarder
args: cd ../.. && docker compose --profile covesa up --detach && docker compose logs -f covesa-cv-forwarder influxDB csv-provider-covesa databroker && cd components/covesa-cv-forwarder && docker exec -it influxDB cat /tmp/out/fms-demo.token > /tmp/influxdb.token && cargo run --bin covesa-cv-forwarder influx --influxdb-uri http://influxdb:8086 --influxdb-token-file /tmp/influxdb.token --influxdb-bucket demo
